hero.title: Life Certificate Verification Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Book your appointment online and avoid long queues. Fast, secure, and accessible service for all pensioners.

step1.title: Book Online
step1.description: Fill the simple form with your details and choose your preferred date and time.

step2.title: Get Confirmation
step2.description: Receive instant confirmation with your queue position and estimated wait time.

step3.title: Visit or Connect
step3.description: Visit the office or connect online at your scheduled time for verification.

step4.title: Certificate Verified
step4.description: Your life certificate is verified and updated in the system instantly.

priority.title: Priority for Senior Citizens
priority.description: Citizens aged 80 and above receive priority queue placement.

online.title: Online Verification
online.description: Verify from home through secure video call. No need to travel.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Track your queue position and estimated wait time in real-time.

accessible.title: Fully Accessible
accessible.description: Designed for everyone with support for screen readers and multiple languages.

q1.question: What documents do I need?
q1.answer: You need your Life Certificate Number, valid ID proof, and a guardian/nominee present for verification.

q2.question: How long does verification take?
q2.answer: The verification process typically takes 10-15 minutes once your turn arrives.

q3.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
q3.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your appointment up to 24 hours before the scheduled time.

q4.question: Is online verification available for everyone?
q4.answer: Yes, online verification via video call is available for all pensioners with a stable internet connection.

q5.question: What are the office timings?
q5.answer: The office is open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, excluding public holidays.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our services and mission
about.content: The Life Certificate Queue Management System is an initiative by the Department of Pension & Pensioners Welfare to streamline the life certificate verification process for pensioners across India.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide a seamless, accessible, and efficient life certificate verification experience for all pensioners, with special care for senior citizens.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A digital-first approach to government services that is inclusive, transparent, and citizen-centric.
